EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your case number is CASE-.
To evaluate your request for a return material authorization, please provide the missing information below:
Original PO number: <enter PO # here> Honeywell Sales Order Number: <enter HW SO # here> Invoice or Shipping document number: <enter invoice/shipping doc # here> Part Number and Quantity: < enter part # and return qty here> Serial number (if present): <enter serial # or N/A here> Detailed reason for request to return: <enter reason here> Confirm country name from which part is returning to Honeywell: <request this only if the part is returning to HIS>
Please Note: If you are reporting parts received in damaged condition, please provide a picture of the part and the original packaging as well.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
